text: Harriet Nelson (born Peggy Louise Snyder; July 18 1909 â€“ October 2, 1994) was an American singer and actress. She first worked in vaudeville when she was 3. In The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet, she played Harriet Nelson. She played Marge in Happy Days. Nelson was born in Des Moines, Iowa. She died from heart failure at age 85 in Laguna Beach, California. == Other websites == * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Iowa Category:1909 births Category:1994 deaths
title: Harriet Nelson
